thread.title: Oil Spill Forces Partial Closure of Mississippi River
thread.title_full: Oil Spill Forces Partial Closure of Mississippi River - WSJ

author: Dan Molinski
title: Oil Spill Forces Partial Closure of Mississippi River
text:
The Coast Guard said Thursday it has closed a portion of the Mississippi River near Paducah, Ky. after an oil spill from a towboat collision.
The collision Wednesday night damaged at least one barge containing clarified slurry oil, a refinery byproduct, â€œrupturing the cargo tank and discharging an unknown amount of oil into the Mississippi... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
